frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-compiz-alike-windows-effect
frozen.shortDescription: Wobbly windows effect inspired by the Compiz ones
frozen.longDescription:
Wobbly windows effect inspired by the Compiz ones

NB
In case of update error please restart Gnome Shell (on Xorg press ALT+F2 then write r and press enter, on Wayland end the session and log in again)

-----------------------------------
 ALTERNATIVE
-----------------------------------
alternative extension to obtain an effect more similar to the original:
https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/3210/compiz-windows-effect/
